meanings.definition: The study of retroviruses and their interactions with their hosts.
meanings.sent1: In retrovirology, scientists investigate how retroviruses affect living organisms.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in retrovirology work to understand how retroviruses function in the body.
meanings.sent3: The retrovirology class was so interesting that even the lab mice wanted to join!
meanings.sent4: The field of retrovirology shines a light on the hidden world of viral interactions.
meanings.sent5: Through retrovirology, we uncover the secrets of how retroviruses operate within cells.

meanings.definition: The scientific discipline that focuses on the biology and pathology of retroviruses.
meanings.sent1: Experts in retrovirology study the structure and behavior of retroviruses.
meanings.sent2: Retrovirology plays a crucial role in understanding the diseases caused by retroviruses.
meanings.sent3: The retrovirology conference had everyone buzzing about viral research!
meanings.sent4: In the world of retrovirology, viruses are like tiny biological puzzles waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed a mesmerizing world of retrovirology within the infected cells.
